reviews.review_msg: Found him condescending, rude, and childish on class.  Everything that came out of his mouth mad me cringe for some reason.  Fairly helpful one on one though.  Overall not a good prof in my opinion.

I took his course in 1994 and it warms my heart that students still love him the way we did 11 years ago. He is the BEST professor on this planet. Warm, engaging, interesting, dynamic. I'm about to enter my Phd and I talk about him as my teaching role model all the time to my classmates.
